description: This tool performs image intensity harmonization across MRI datasets for T2-weighted (T2w) modalities of different organs (e.g., prostate, breast rectum). It process each image to produce an output with adjusted intensities that appear clearer and brighter, while preserving anatomical structure. The harmonized images exhibit consistent tissue intensity profiles, effectively reducing variability caused by differences in scanners or acquisition protocols. This standardization enhances the comparability of images across datasets and supports more robust downstream analysis.
name: Image intensity normalization
